author: Ktn News
title: Why half of Kenyan men should be in jail for sexual offences - VIDEO | The Standard
text:
Short Video Clips / 22 hours ago [VIDEO] Why half of Kenyan men should be in jail for sexual offences 
Studies show that most Kenyan men had their first sexual encounter before they turned 18 with girls of their age or younger. But according to the law, this is a criminal offence punishable by up to 15 years in jail. 
Related Videos 4 days ago
